title: Survey on League habits and Leadership
body:
I prepared a survey on your game style and Leadership abilities. 
****
Link to the discussion:  ( https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/it/c/off-topic-en/ZjPdmm5N-survey-on-league-players?comment=0008 )
****
I already posted it on Ita and Eng Boards, but I need to study Deutsch gamers too to complete it.

This is the link to the survey, please if you have the time, click and do it.

I did not ask anymore for emails, just summoner name, if you don't want to share type random!

Results will be shared in a month.

Thank You for your time and patience

https://it.surveymonkey.com/r/YourTest_EN_Lol          {{champion:74}}
